summary: This document contains correspondence from Jenny Park of Sprint Nextel regarding compliance with a subpoena related to the Epstein case. It includes subscriber information for various phone numbers and details about the compliance process. The document highlights the involvement of Detective Joe Recarey from the Palm Beach Police Department in the investigation.

persons.name: Jenny Park
persons.context: Jenny Park is responsible for providing subpoena compliance information related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Joe Recarey
persons.context: Detective Joe Recarey is mentioned as the recipient of the subpoena compliance information from Sprint Nextel.

persons.name: Mary Ann Camardese
persons.context: Mary Ann Camardese is identified as the account holder for one of the phone numbers related to the subpoena.

persons.name: Jesus
persons.context: Jesus is identified as the account holder for another phone number related to the subpoena.

connections.description: Jenny Park provides subpoena compliance information to Detective Joe Recarey as part of the investigation.
Mary Ann Camardese's account information is provided to Detective Joe Recarey as part of the subpoena compliance.
Jesus's account information is provided to Detective Joe Recarey as part of the subpoena compliance.

events.title: Subpoena Compliance Request
events.description: Sprint Nextel provides requested subscriber information for specified phone numbers as part of a subpoena compliance.

keyFacts: The document includes subscriber information for multiple phone numbers related to the Epstein case.
Jenny Park is the point of contact for subpoena compliance at Sprint Nextel.
Detective Joe Recarey is actively involved in the investigation and receives information from Sprint.
Mary Ann Camardese and Jesus are identified as account holders for phone numbers relevant to the case.
The document is subject to protective orders, indicating sensitive information is involved.
